justification: The company has publicly disclosed its health and safety policies, provided information on the number of employee accidents, and emphasized its commitment to protecting the health and safety of its employees. Additionally, the company covers its suppliers and vendors in its policies regarding health, safety, and welfare. Although the specific details about labor fatalities are not available from the provided pages, it is mentioned that such statistics can be found in official reports or on the company's website.
One or more than one directors (Mr. Hari Mohan Bangur and Mr. Prashant Bangur) are marked as permanent board members.
